awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 10 wins & 10 nominations.

fullplot: Sherry Swanson returns home to New Jersey after serving a three year prison sentence. Eager to reestablish a relationship with her young daughter, Sherry soon discovers that coming back to the world she left behind is far more difficult than she had planned.
plot: Sherry tries to integrate again into society and become a good mother.
title: Sherrybaby
